If it wasn’t for Britain we Tamil people will be in our own soil, but you Britain had to come to Srilankan  and make Sinhala people and Tamil people enemies ,because of you Britain’s were dying to have our own country back, if you sorted this out there will be more jobs for English people in London, Nottingham and more places, so I suggest that you fix it for your country and my country .
I am only a child age of 11 and don’t know how my country looks like because they could be danger any were in Jaffna(I really want to see my country and my home in Jaffna .) In history British started this war so please finish the war for us.
